channel.title: Why does this keep happening?
channel.description:
Hello there,
I need help with ALL the downloaded clients.
When i download a client i really want to play i can never play on it.
The reason is because when i click on the "run.bat" file it always says Javac is not reconized as an extrenal or internal commands, or it just opens up real fast and closes.
Im not really sure what is making it do this, but i always have to play a server on Dragonscape client.
But the only Dragonscape Client that works is the 508, and 525. But im getting bored of it.
Can anyone please help me on how to fix the problem.
Thanks :)

Set you’re fucking paths. And if you need help with that refer to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,375681.0.html

this

also, post all batch file related issues in the sticky.

item.title: Why does this keep happening?
item.dc:creator: @Ambriosa1 Ambriosa1
item.description:
@Ambriosa1 wrote:

Ok What you’re going to do Is…

[flash=200,200]http://You’re going to open the Cleint’s folder. And you’re going to Right click the Run Piece.
Then Simply edit the JDK version to yours. For example… The JDK version that was already in the folder could be. [JDK._06_03) The Last digits are mostly the important… And if you have a JDK version of JDK._06_13 Then simply Change it buddy…[/flash]

Read full topic

item.title: Why does this keep happening?

Read full topic

item.title: Why does this keep happening?
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Right click on the compiler and click ‘Edit’ with notepad,

and replace all of it with:

@echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Hope it works, if it doesn’t post back.

Read full topic

item.title: Why does this keep happening?

When i download a client i really want to play i can never play on it.

The reason is because when i click on the “run.bat” file it always says Javac is not reconized as an extrenal or internal commands, or it just opens up real fast and closes.
